values:
so school fuckin starts in 3 weeks. and this saturday my friend is coming back from wherever the fuck she was so i get to spend 3 weeks with her. woot. notice, i am not excited.

fucking homophobes. i like that thing kate posted on myspace earlier. it put a nice perspective on it all.

huh.. i need to shave my legs. and take a shower. im so gross. 

okay, so im like fucking pissed off at everyone, i have to deal with my stress and everyone else's to top it off, and now my mom decides that i'm depressed and i need fucking therapy! ach. pyschologists, pyschiatrists, whatever, they dont know a thing. its all bullshit!  so no. i said no, and she said yes, and i said no. end of discussion. we'll see what becomes of that. hehehehe...
http://creapie43.livejournal.com/2605.html

I had a huge argument with my mom last night. She accused me of not telling her stuff, so I accused her of not telling me stuff either. Unfortunately when she challenged me, I just said that she didn't tell me for a while about her and my dad divorcing. I asked her what I was keeping from her and she simply said that she didn't know that I thought she was keeping stuff from me. Ultimately confusing but oh well.

After getting back from the camp, I've found it harder than ever to know that I'm a lesbian. Every little thing that people say get to me, "Is anyone on hitting on her, Mike? Do boys come the door" my step uncle to my dad. And my mom saying I'm hiding stuff. My friends asking me the 3 questions i let them (see my AIM profile) the first one usually being, Are you gay? and what am i supposed to say? they are kidding because it definately isn't possible that a real person they know is. And that comment I just made was sarcastic through and through.

You know, I go to bed crying every night because I don't understand how I can live here, yet now I've realized that I can't keep asking my mom to leave, even jokingly. No matter how bitchy I am, she is going through a lot, and my dad would never let her leave. Poop on him. No, I'm not trying to be funny. I honestly don't know how I'm going to get through the next several years.

The whole camp thing. It was brilliant. It made me forget about reality, but.. well. It was nice. The people were nice. Nicer than anywhere on earth. Honestly. This school year is going to suck.
http://creapie43.livejournal.com/2538.html

i just got back from the arts/music camp in NJ. it was alright. missed lollapalooza which sucks, but im over it. a month and a few days til school starts again, which really sucks. all my friends came over today. it was kind of boring. aaah, i miss not normal people from new jersey... oh well. i got honeycomb by frank black and golden ocean by 50footwave the first is good, the second i havent really listened to. my pixies cd from the concert is supposed to come in a couple days..

- - -
the concert was good.. it was over a month ago, but i havent posted in this for a while. i have some pics from it.. i'll put them up sometime.    aaahh.. im tired.. i'll try to keep up w/ this from now on.
http://creapie43.livejournal.com/2132.html
now 16 days. and i don't feel like seeing how many hours/mins/secs... ach. i can't stand waiting anymore. i am so bored. and i have to go sailing with my stupid cousins. poo.
http://creapie43.livejournal.com/1976.html

I haven't put anything in this for a long time, but oh well.
only 17 more days until i can see my beloved pixies. in indianapolis. with sam, alex, and alana. 

I am thoroughly fed up with my ipod. the sound quality sucks.. and it takes forever to put my cds on it. and i hate it. and i also hate babysitting. it's so boring.

only 11 days and 1 hour of school. isn't that stupid? they make us go for a goddamn hour. but i'm not going the last half day, which is after the last whole day, which is the 7th. because, the pixies concert is the 7th, and the 8th i will be coming back from indianapolis. and i will miss school. so haha. now i'd better go read that book for english.
http://creapie43.livejournal.com/1764.html

nothing much. alana and sam came over again, we went to  the mall again yesterday. how very depressing. someone arrested i think. but no one cares. not even me.

cramps. pretty awful. its passover, i think. i'll ask someone. i hate holidays. i like the holiday song, though.
http://creapie43.livejournal.com/1486.html
not much happened. yet again. same old, same old. school, then homework. so boring. god, i'm gonna die..
http://creapie43.livejournal.com/1217.html

my friends mom told him i was a bad influence on him and we shouldnt be friends anymore. what a bitch.






was in town with alana, schiller, naomi, sam, alex.. went to pancake house, and paid in nickels, dimes, quarters. tip in pennies and jolly ranchers. SOO embarassing.we were all digging through our pockets to pay.

something stirred up the sediment in the water here a couple days ago, so nobody was supposed to drink it.. and i didnt know. it was awful. i couldnt take a shower, or brush my teeth, or anything.


people are morons.
http://creapie43.livejournal.com/959.html

god, i totally cannot stand to live in this fuckin suburb anywaymore. I HATE IT. HATE HATE HATE HATE HATE.
the people are so fuckin boring.. the ONE AND ONLY record store that isnt a chain can't pay the rent unless they charge $15-18 for a cd. there are 3 things you can do on the weekend: go to the mall, sit around with friends and be depressed/sit around alone and be depressed or wish you lived somewhere interesting.. and you can make the best of it, and listen to music.. play music.


but i cant even do that, because my mom fuckin makes me play piano! she wont let me play bass. but im gonna anyway. i'll babysit.. (god, i hate it) cuz its the only way to make money, and i'll buy a bass. and im selling my ipod. i hate it. i really do. its so dumb. and if i sell it, i'll have more money. but i cant sell my cds. no way.

nobody here knows what music is. i talk to people on goddamn pixies sites! its awful. god, this town is totally ruining my life. i am actually counting the days til i can leave. i even try to get good grades in school and im in advanced class so i can graduate high school early.

i hope i can go to lollapalooza. that would be the light of my lightless life. its depressing, isnt it? im going to learn how to knit. it takes up a lot of time. and then, i can sell stuff i knit. yea. i could knit while i babysit. aha, brilliant. 


dedicated is the best song. yea
http://creapie43.livejournal.com/710.html

today was boring.. what a big surprise. got my hair cut tuesday. really short now. sorta poofy. going to weird camp in new jersey. play bass? maybe.... school is boring, as usual. stupid notes in social studies, stupid experiments in science, stupid math in math. same as it usually is. health was gross. my cat is fat. fitzsimmons is so annoying. i sware i'll rip her head of one of these days..
http://creapie43.livejournal.com/468.html
